I have over 1500 hours. Thats all you need to know
Fun game to play when you play with a group of friends.

The aim is pretty hard to get a handle on at first due to the intensity of the recoil, but with enough training using external apps like Aim Lab, and in-game workshop maps, along with just playing, you can quickly gain skill.
The competitive and wingman modes are fun in comparison to casual, but casual is good for warming up. Wingman, however, seems to have a much larger hacking scene within it which causes issues for legit players.
The speed and intensity of matches leads to a lot of fun clips and moments.
